profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-05 19:51:50 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Tufts Educational Day Care Center Records

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series: Unprocessed accessions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records created by the Tufts Education Day Care Center and includes correspondence, job descriptions, newspaper clippings, and proposals. Significant topics in this collection include the Day Care Center's financial activities and sustainability.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Tufts Educational Day Care Center offers an innovative year-round, full-day educational preschool and kindergarten program for children from within the Tufts community and its surrounding cities.
Founding date is based on start date of Special Friends program.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.
